The title says it all!

I finally got this site up and running. I could not have done it without a lot of googling and stumbling upon Jekyll.

I hope to add more to this site as time moves on. For the rest of this break, I hope to get a good amount of work in. However, once the semester starts up again, I know things will get busy and work here will slow down.

Thanks for reading this post! Comments, questions, and feedback are always welcome.
